title: Ticket #911: condor_configure misuses ifconfig & host on sun4u_sol_5.9
description:
On our NMI machines, in the nightlies, the remote_pre task for sun4u_sol_5.9 has stderr output which I've included (and slightly modifies because it corrupts the html even in a verbatim block). It appears to stem from condor_configure using ifconfig incorrectly on solaris. This needs investigation.
